text: Hi, I'm trying to set value of one of the form fields using javascript. It works, but when I want to fill other fields that js input dissapears. What's even weirder in the inspector input value is still js generated text, but visualy field is empty and doesn't send any value when submitted. I don't have any idea how to solve that
Ok, right now I'm using $(this).find('input').attr('value', jobName);

We have two clients that started suddenly getting regular spam form submissions on 2/25. Recaptcha is enabled in the forms. Any suggestions or has anyone else experienced a sudden increase of spam?
